Set #71020 Friends are Family Harley Quinn:
column2: Dressed in a smart looking white suite with sparkling sequins, this fun looking variant of Harley from The LEGO Batman Movie was seen during the end credits dance sequence. Her legs feature no printing, she has no hand-held accessories, but she does come with a pair of mismatched roller skates, one pearl gold the other silver and features a white tutu piece.

column1: She includes two expressions, one winking with a smile and the other with her tongue sticking out. Her mask looks odd on that face, almost as if the thing was supposed to be printed with the winking expression instead. It might be an error in printing honestly. Overall though she'
column2: s a solid looking figure from The LEGO Batman Movie and her costume is very stylish. Highly Recommended.
